mapper.select: SELECT r.contractManageCode ,bR.shopMemberId ,bR.clientId ,m.serviceName ,r.serviceAmount ,r.servicePeriod ,r.serviceTotalPrice ,r.serviceRequestDate ,r.serviceRegistrationDate ,r.serviceEndDate ,r.serviceRequestStatus ,r.serviceApprovalDate FROM k2_sw_contractRequest AS r INNER JOIN k2_sw_serviceManagement AS m ON r.serviceCode = m.serviceCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_mainBusinessCodeManagement AS mB ON r.mainBusinessCode = mB.mainBusinessCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_businessRegistration AS bR ON mB.businessRegistrationCode = bR.businessRegistrationCode ORDER BY serviceRequestDate ASC;

SELECT r.contractManageCode ,m.serviceName ,r.serviceAmount ,r.servicePeriod ,r.serviceTotalPrice ,r.serviceRequestDate ,r.serviceRegistrationDate ,r.serviceEndDate ,r.serviceRequestStatus ,r.serviceApprovalDate FROM k2_sw_contractRequest AS r INNER JOIN k2_sw_serviceManagement AS m ON r.serviceCode = m.serviceCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_mainBusinessCodeManagement AS mB ON r.mainBusinessCode = mB.mainBusinessCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_businessRegistration AS bR ON bR.businessRegistrationCode = mB.businessRegistrationCode WHERE bR.clientId = 'shopid001' ORDER BY r.serviceRequestDate ASC;

SELECT bR.clientId ,r.contractManageCode ,m.serviceName ,r.serviceAmount ,r.servicePeriod ,r.serviceTotalPrice ,r.serviceRequestDate ,r.serviceRegistrationDate ,r.serviceEndDate ,r.serviceRequestStatus ,r.serviceApprovalDate FROM k2_sw_contractRequest AS r INNER JOIN k2_sw_serviceManagement AS m ON r.serviceCode = m.serviceCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_mainBusinessCodeManagement AS mB ON r.mainBusinessCode = mB.mainBusinessCode INNER JOIN k0_sw_businessRegistration AS bR ON mB.businessRegistrationCode = bR.businessRegistrationCode WHERE contractManageCode = #{contractManageCode} GROUP BY bR.clientId ORDER BY r.serviceRequestDate ASC;

SELECT
main.mainBusinessCode ,main.businessCode ,main.businessLevelCode ,main.businessRegistrationCode ,main.businessCodeRegistrationDate FROM k0_sw_mainBusinessCodeManagement AS main INNER JOIN k0_sw_businessRegistration AS bR ON main.businessRegistrationCode = bR.businessRegistrationCode WHERE bR.clientId = 'shopid001';

SELECT c.contractManageCode ,c.mainBusinessCode ,s.serviceName ,c.memberId ,c.serviceCode ,c.serviceAmount ,c.servicePeriod ,c.serviceTotalPrice ,c.slipNumber ,c.serviceRegistrationDate ,c.serviceEndDate ,c.serviceRequestDate ,c.serviceRequestStatus ,c.serviceApprovalDate FROM k2_sw_contractRequest AS c INNER JOIN k2_sw_serviceManagement AS s ON c.serviceCode = s.serviceCode WHERE contractManageCode = #{contractManageCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k2_sw_paymentSum ( paymentCode ,contractManageCode ,slipNumber ,servicePaymentDueDate ,paymentSumRegistration ) SELECT (SELECT CONCAT('sum',(MAX(CAST((SUBSTRING_INDEX(paymentCode,'sum',-1)) AS UNSIGNED)+1))) FROM k2_sw_paymentSum AS l) ,#{contractManageCode} ,'' ,DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ,NOW() WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT contractManageCode FROM k2_sw_paymentSum WHERE contractManageCode = #{contractManageCode} );
